actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to require that Indian claims be disregarded when determining the adequacy and value of the security required for real estate mortgage loans made by Federal land banks under the Farm Credit Act of 1971.

summary.text: Amends the Farm Credit Act of 1971 to require that Indian claims be disregarded in determining the adequacy and value of the security required for real estate mortgage loans made by Federal land banks.

titles.title: A bill to require that Indian claims be disregarded when determining the adequacy and value of the security required for real estate mortgage loans made by Federal land banks under the Farm Credit Act of 1971.
